ee thamayi me wage awasthawakadi aarakshaka hamuda wisin kshanika thirana ganima saha ehi athuru prathipala. 10 denekuge jiwitha beraganima sandaha warthakaruwan idiriye ekeku maranna ma nam pasubata wenne naha. 1988 - 89 kalayedi ma mewani awastha rashiyakata muhunadi, eka siwil purawasiyaku ho nomara, warthakaruwanta pahara nodi, karalikaruwanta le perenna paharadi, thathwaya samathayakata pathkala.
